feed.title: Little Grand Rapids - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
